descriptionHidden: Rosemary Torgesen is admitted to Smokey Point on a court order after refusing to eat, drink and take medications for her schizophreniaz
Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Providence Regional Medical Center’s emergency room for “abnormal labs”

description: Caller claims she was abused while a patient at Smokey Point, “mostly malpractice type abuse”

descriptionHidden: A Smokey Point staff member recommends Rosemary “be sent to a more medical psych unit”

description: Staff member goes to ER after being bitten by patient

descriptionHidden: Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s emergency room for the second time for refusing to eat, drink and take medications

description: Patient falls out of a chair and a doctor requests an ambulance
Patient punches nurse in head and face
Patient arrested after punching another patient in head and face

descriptionHidden: Smokey Point sends Rosemary to Northwest Hospital to be evaluated for admission, but she is returned that day after being medically cleared
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for abnormal labs

description: Patient taken to ER after overdose
Patient taken to ER after collapsing and going into an unresponsive state
Hospital error results in giving patient medication meant for another, requiring medical follow-up
Alfie Alvarado-Ramos, director of state Department of Veterans Affairs, emcees ceremony for new military unit at Smokey Point
Regulators return to inspect Smokey Point and find serious violations “resulted in an unsafe environment for patients”
Hospital calls a “code blue” for patient not breathing

descriptionHidden: Rosemary falls at Smokey Point and is taken to the emergency room at Cascade Valley Hospital, where she is diagnosed with a broken arm
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for refusing to drink any fluids
Smokey Point records refer to her as being “bedbound”

description: Health professional reports caller suggested she would harm herself after denied admission at Smokey Point due to “insurance type”

descriptionHidden: Smokey Point records show she has developed a bed sore
Smokey Point sends her to Providence’s ER for the third time for refusing to eat, drink or take medication
Smokey Point sends her to Providence a sixth time and refuses to accept her back

description: Regulators return to inspect Smokey Point and find serious violations “resulted in an unsafe environment for patients”

descriptionHidden: Providence physicians discover she has a broken right hip, apparently from a fall four weeks earlier

description: US HealthVest CEO pitches a third proposed psychiatric hospital in Washington at a public hearing, pledging to boost the region’s mental-health workforce and saying Smokey Point “demonstrates our strategies are successful.”

descriptionHidden: Rosemary Torgesen dies, with malnutrition given as the primary cause by the medical examiner
